alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 8:40AM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, with ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Rain will turn back to snow towards this evening, with snow at times. Later this evening, snow will transition to rain, sleet and freezing rain, with all rain by later tonight. * WHERE...In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions later today into tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
